items.headline: Chili’s parent offers fresh sign that consumers are still eating out. The stock surges.
items.summary_en: Brinker’s stock surges, as the Chili’s as strong traffic growth led to better-than-expected quarterly sales.

items.headline: Perplexity wants to buy Google Chrome. Wall Street dismisses the notion as a stunt.
items.summary_en: The AI startup has put in a $34.5 billion bid to buy Chrome as a key antitrust ruling looms. But analysts say the price looks low and Google is unlikely to be selling.

items.headline: ​Trump has perfected a tax on corporate America — just don’t call it a tax. Here’s how it could affect stocks.
